NAME: self.maxhealth
DESCRIPTION: this is the players max health.

NAME: self.allowCopycat
DESCRIPTION: allows you to copycat when you die.

NAME: self.postGamePromotion
DESCRIPTION: promotes you when the game ends

NAME: self.team
DESCRIPTION: get / set your team with this variable

NAME: self.pers[ zombieKills ]
DESCRIPTION: player zombie kills (zombieKills needs to be in quotes!

NAME: self.money
DESCRIPTION: the player's money variable in zombies
